Channel.title: XML.com
Channel.rdfs:label: XML.com
Channel.description: XML.com features a rich mix of information and services for the XML community.

item.title: The Restful Web: Amazon's Simple Queue Service
item.description: In Joe Gregorio's latest Restful Web column, he explains that Amazon's Simple Queue Service, a web service offering a queue for reliable storage of transient messages, isn't as RESTful as it claims.
item.rdfs:label: jcg-restful-article
item.dc:creator: Joe Gregorio

item.title: Transforming XML: Extending XSLT with EXSLT
item.description: In this month's Transforming XML column, Bob DuCharme reports happily that the promise of XSLT extensibility via EXSLT has become a reality.
item.rdfs:label: bdc-trxml-article
item.dc:creator: Bob DuCharme
